# Quarantine Wall

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Ninjutsu, Bukijutsu, Barrier Ninjutsu
- Class: Defensive
- Range: Short, Mid
- Users: Renga Kokub≈ç
- Media: Anime

## Summary
Using his shield as a medium, Renga creates a massive chakra barrier. It is strong enough to withstand a bomb detonation.
